title: Player Profile View — Click-to-See Player Stats Modal
description: Interactive player profile modal in The Lab Teams section. Click any player name to see career stats (IPL 2023+), phase performance, role tags, matchup data (vs bowling type for batters, vs batting hand for bowlers), vs team performance, entry points, and archetypes. Pre-computed JSON data pipeline + modal UI with mobile support. PRD: docs/specs/PLAYER_PROFILE_VIEW_PRD.md
